mapper.insert: insert into comment (mem_id, post_id, com_text) values (#{mem_id}, #{post_id}, #{com_text})
mapper.select: select * from comment where post_id = #{post_id} order by com_time desc
select * from subcomment where com_id = #{com_id} order by subcom_time desc
select * from (select p.post_id, s.* from post p, comment c, subcomment s where p.post_id = c.post_id and s.com_id = c.com_id) as view where post_id = #{post_id} order by subcom_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into subcomment (mem_id, com_id, subcom_text) values (#{mem_id}, #{com_id}, #{subcom_text})
mapper.select: SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(second, (select com_time from comment where com_id = #{com_id}), current_timestamp())
SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(second, (select subcom_time from subcomment where subcom_id = #{subcom_id}), current_timestamp())
